Title: Episode #1.4
Writer: Steven Knight (created by), Tom Hardy (created by), Chips Hardy (created by), Steven Knight, Emily Ballou
Actors: Tom Hardy, Jessie Buckley, Morgan Walters, Jason Watkins
Plot: The plot against Delaney puts Lorna in danger, Delaney enlists help for a scheme of his own, and an invitation to an opulent ball leads to unexpected consequences.
